title.en: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls Gekijou Wide☆

altTitles.en: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls Theater Wide☆

altTitles.ja: アイドルマスター　シンデレラガールズ シンデレラガールズ劇場 わいど☆

description.en:
An arrangement of comics released in the mobile game "iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls Starlight Stage."  
  
Part of [THE iDOLM@STER](https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=iDOLM%40STER) series.

altTitles.ja: バジリスク～甲賀忍法帖～

description.en:
By the order of Shogun Ieyasu Tokugawa, ten ninja from the Iga and the Kouga clans must fight to the death in order to determine who will be the next Tokugawa Shogun, with the surviving clan ruling for the next thousand years. But Oboro of the Iga clan and Gennosuke of the Kouga clan have fallen deeply in love. Now these star-crossed lovers have been pitted against each other. Can their romance conquer a centuries-old rivalry? Or is their love destined to end in death?  
  
Note: Won the Kodansha Manga Award in the category "Best General Manga" in 2004.
description.pl:
Dwa wielkie klany, Iga i Kouga, pochodzące z jednego rodu, zawsze walczyły o dominację w kraju. Po latach względnie dobrych stosunków muszą ponownie wkroczyć na ścieżkę wojenną, by wybrać nowego szoguna - zastępcę Ieyasu Tokugawa. Jednak, aby ograniczyć niepotrzebne ofiary, decydują się na wybranie dwudziestu najlepszych, którzy mają stanąć do walki na śmierć i życie. Mimo to, stare waśnie odżywają z zaskakującą siłą…  
  
MANGA PRZEZNACZONA DLA OSÓB POWYŻEJ 16 ROKU ŻYCIA!
description.pt-br: No anos de 1614, no auge do Japão Feudal, para resolver a disputa pela sucessão do Xogunato, Ieyasu Tokugawa quebra um acordo de paz feito entre os clãs rivais de Tsubagakure Iga e de Manjidani Kouga, que era mantido há muitos anos, apesar de ainda haver ódio entre os clãs.

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

title.en: I Am the Main Characters' Child

altTitles.en: I Was Born as the Lead Characters' Child
I Am the Male Lead's Child

altTitles.es: Nací como la hija de los protagonistas

altTitles.ja: メインキャラの娘になりました

description.en:
A duke's daughter, aged six, was being bullied by the servants when all of a sudden, she started to recall her past life. Emeliet realized that she had been reborn into the world of the novel that she had read in her past life, as the child of the main characters!

Three years after the novel's end, her mother had died while giving birth to her, and as a result, her father had abandoned her. In order to overcome her dire situation, Emeliet puts into motion her plan to get closer to her dad...

Will Emeliet overcome immense odds stacked against her and recover her dad's love?
description.ko:
시종들에게 괴롭힘을 당하던 어린 에멜리에트는
어느 날 불현듯 전생의 기억을 떠올리게 된다.
그리고 깨닫는다.
자신이 전생에 읽었던 책 속으로 환생했다는 것을.
그것도 주인공들의 아이로……!

소설의 엔딩으로부터 3년 뒤, 엄마는 자신을 낳다 죽었고
그로 인해 아빠는 하나뿐인 딸을 방치하고 있는 상황이었다.

‘계속 이렇게 살 순 없어!’

상황을 바꾸겠다고 마음 먹은 차 들려온, 아빠의 귀환 소식!
그런데…….

“저것이 왜 내 눈앞에 있는 것이냐.”

고대하던 첫만남에는 싸늘한 눈총만이 돌아 올 뿐이었다.

‘……그래도 포기 못해!’

에멜리에트는 본격! 아빠 꼬시기 작전에 돌입한다!

하나. 자주 마주치기
“파파 안뇽! 파파 오디 가?”

둘. 선물 공세
“파파~ 이거 줄게. 선물이야. 앞으로 친하게 지내자. 이제 매일 올게!”

셋. 칭찬하기!

“앗! 눈부셔~ 파파한테서 빛이 나서 가까이 못 가겠어.”

그런데 뭔가 이상하다.

“집무실.”
물어보는 대로 성실하게 다 대답해 주고,
“쓸모없는 걸 가져왔군.”
쓸모없다면서 고이 간직하고 있질 않나,
“……시끄럽다.”
칭찬엔 유독 부끄러워하는데 이거 정말 나 싫어하는 거 맞아?

altTitles.ja: ハンキー・ドリー

description.en: The protagonist Yukari and the twin brothers Shun and Ou have grown up like a family ever since they were children. However, their relationship begins changing on the first day of high school…?

altTitles.ja: 苺ましまろ

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

In a world where monster hunters are hailed as heroes, Cheon Haesun has been treated like an outcast because of his abnormal looks. As if that wasn't bad enough, a pack of monsters attacks his neighborhood on the day he discovers he's dying from an unknown illness!

With his sister's sacrifice, Haesun survives and somehow awakens to become a Poisoner, a rare hunter with toxic healing abilities.

But will his poisonous powers cure Haesun's illness and guarantee a normal life he's always dreamed of?

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

altTitles.vi: Cô Gái Thân Yêu Của Tôi

description.en:
"It seems like I'd like someone like you."

"You're really like a little pony." 

This is a slice-of-life of the romance and exploits of an adorkable and ditzy senior "little fox" and her dependable junior "little pony".
description.uk: "Здається, мені б сподобався хтось на кшталт тебе". "Ти справді як маленьке поні". Буденність про романтику та подвиги чарівної й навіженої Старшої "лисички" та її надійної Молодшої "поні".
description.zh: “我好像会喜欢你这样的人。” “你好像一匹小马。” 呆萌跳脱年上“小狐狸”和她的靠谱 “年下小马驹”的爱情事业双丰收日常 。

title.en: Kuzumi-kun, Can't You Read the Room?

altTitles.ja: 久住くん、空気読めてますか?

altTitles.th: แอบรักนาย ผู้ชายไม่แคร์โลก

altTitles.fr: Kuzumi, tu peux pas faire attention à l'ambiance ?

description.en: Erika Sakura is the school's most popular female high schooler, and only met with envious gazes since she is out of everyone's league. However, she is recently interested in a certain male high schooler who can't read between the lines, Kuzumi. While having a relationship between the two is out of the question, her unrequited love will soon change in this romantic comedy. Follow this new inevitably heart pounding, out-of-contact short love comedy!
description.pt: Sakura Erika é a garota mais popular da escola, e os únicos olhares que encontra são de inveja, já que ela é muita areia para o caminhãozinho de todos. No entanto, recentemente, ela se interessou por um certo estudante do qual não consegue ler entre as linhas, Kuzumi. Mesmo que um relacionamento entre os dois esteja fora de questão, seu amor não correspondido em breve irá mudar nessa comédia romântica. Siga esse incontestável curta de comédia romântica que inevitavelmente fará seu coração acelerar!

altTitles.ja: マキちゃんはタコメイド

description.en: "Once they get entangled, they won't let go!? Yandere Heroine x Different Species Romantic Comedy!!"
description.es-la:
Maki es una yōkai pulpo que vive sola en una vieja casa. Un día conoce a Wataru, un hombre ajizai (cangrejo ermitaño) que se ha mudado a la casa de al lado.

A Maki le interesa ayudar a Wataru en lo que necesite para no sentirse tan sola. Sin embargo, al ser un pulpo, a menudo se entromete demasiado en su vida o usa sus ventosas de forma incómoda para Wataru.

A pesar de sus torpes intentos de ayudar, Wataru comienza a apreciar la compañía de Maki. Poco a poco se vuelven amigos y deciden vivir juntos formalmente.

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

title.en: Hazure Skill "Soine" ga Kakuseishi, Boku ga Saikyou Harem wo Kizuku Made ~Micchaku Soine de Ganbou Kaihou!? Yuuwakusare Makutte Komattemasu!!~

altTitles.ja: ハズレスキル『添い寝』が覚醒し、僕が最強ハーレムを築くまで～密着添い寝で願望解放!? 誘惑されまくって困ってます!!～

altTitles.en: Until My Loser Skill [Sleeping Together] Is Awakened and I Build the Strongest Harem ~ Unleash Your Desires by Sleeping Close to Each Other!? I’m Getting Tempted So Much and I’m in Trouble!!~

description.en:
Regnard defies expectations by enrolling in the esteemed Royal Academy of Lasarzia despite being a dropout. 

However, during the Blessing Ceremony, he receives a peculiar skill called "Blessing of Sleeping Together," leading to ridicule from classmates. 

Despite the mockery, Regnard discovers the true potential of this skill when he spends the night with Frost, an honor student.

 This revelation leads to unexpected adventures and a harem fantasy, as Regnard navigates the challenges of his newfound abilities and hidden desires.
description.ja: 神からスキルを与えられる『祝福の儀』で、『添い寝の祝福』というハズレスキルを授かった新入生のレグナード。ヘンテコスキルを授かった故に同級生からは奇異の目で見られ、クラスのいじめっ子からはパシリにされる毎日。そんな中、とあるキッカケから優等生のフロストと一夜を共にしたことによって、このスキルの真の能力を知ることになり…。一緒に添い寝で完全回復! さらに隠れた願望暴いて女のコに迫られまくり!?『努力』と『添い寝』で成り上がる、最強ハーレムファンタジー開幕!
description.pt-br: Regnard, um calouro que recebeu o "Despertar da Bênção" que concede habilidades divinas, foi agraciado com a habilidade inusitada de "Bênção do Dormir Juntos". Devido a essa habilidade estranha, ele é visto com olhares estranhos por seus colegas de classe e é constantemente abusado por um valentão da turma. No entanto, depois de passar uma noite com Frost, uma estudante exemplar, por um certo acaso, Regnard descobre o verdadeiro poder desta habilidade... Ele se recupera completamente ao dormir junto com alguém! Além disso, seus desejos ocultos são revelados, e ele é perseguido por várias garotas! "Esforço" e "Dormir Juntos" o levam a ascender, dando início a uma fantasia de harém suprema!

altTitles.ja: このヒーラー、めんどくさい

description.en: Fantasy adventuring comedy starring Karla the dark elf cleric who invested too much on her taunting skills and Alvin the swordsman who has to put up with her.
description.ru:
Фантастическая приключенческая комедия с участием Карлы, тёмной эльфийки-клирика, которая слишком много вложила в навыки грубости, и Элвина, мечника, вынужденного мириться с ней.

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/etot_protivnyi_celitel___A5275))

altTitles.ja: アイドルを探せ

description.en: Chikako Fujitani (18), 1st year at the Hanano Women’s College starts living alone at the same apartment as Kanro (An aspiring mangaka from the same school.) and Chiaki (A bus guide who pretends to be a college student to get a man.) While on the “Country-Bumpkin” tour she encounters Iwata, reconnects with her middle school crush, Nagae, and meets the landlady’s son, Makoto. It’s the kind of story about the bold and flimsy feelings of college students on an awkward, realistic love.
description.ja: 花野女子短大1年、藤谷知香子、18歳。念願のひとり暮らしを同じアパートのカンロちゃん（同じ短大で漫画家志望）、千明さん（バスガイドをしているが、女子大生と偽って男を物色中）と楽しんでいる。おのぼりさんツアーで知りあった岩田君、中学の時の憧れ、永江君、大家さんの息子の誠君…気になる男子も多々…。大学生の大胆で繊細、そして不器用な恋愛をリアルに描いた、とっておきの恋のお話。

title.en: Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto

altTitles.ja: お茶目な奥さんとの日常茶番事
とある奥さんの様子

altTitles.en: The State of a Certain Wife
The Song that Transcends This World

description.en: During troubled times, Weng Shaoying is one of the most famous singers in Dongping. Many people go to Song of Fairyland just to see her perform. However, under her glamorous facade, she has been controlled for more than 10 years. On the other side of Dongping is Bi Xing Tang, one of the most famous gangs there. After her father’s death, Yanchu became the young female leader of Bi Xing Tang, which caused a lot of rumors to spread. On one inevitably fortuitous night, the two happened to meet. At that time, neither of them knew that they would eventually become the most important person in the other’s life. Starting from that night onwards, the gears in Shaoying and Yanchu’s fate will forever be rotating together.

title.en: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!

altTitles.ja: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ha Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi wo!

altTitles.en: You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!
You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!

altTitles.vi: Cậu Ồn Ào Quá, Im lặng Giùm Tớ Đi!

altTitles.ru: Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!

altTitles.tl: Ang Ingay Mo Kaya Manahimik Ka Na Lang!

description.en: Hīragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Enomoto Taiyō. Tsukino is slightly taken aback by Taiyō, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she can't hear.
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

title.en: Bishu no Daichi Fukushu ~Fukushuu no tame ni Kao wo Suteta Onna~

altTitles.ja: 美醜の大地～復讐のために顔を捨てた女～

altTitles.en: A Woman Who Abandoned Her Face for Revenge

altTitles.vi: Vì Hận Tái Sinh ~Người phụ nữ vì phục thù mà từ bỏ gương mặt của mình~

description.en:
A woman who was robbed of her family by bullying is reborn as another person, and she devotes herself to revenge from hell! , Because of her ugly appearance, she was badly bullied at a girls' school. The leader of bullying is Ayako Takashimazu, the daughter of a large company. Hana, who was accused of theft by her, was forced to leave school...!?

(from mangaupdates)
description.ja:
いじめによってすべてを奪われた女が別人に生まれ変わり、地獄の復讐に身を投じる！

昭和20年、太平洋戦争が終わりかけていた時代、樺太（からふと）で生まれ育った少女・市村ハナは、醜い容姿のため女学校で凄惨ないじめを受けていた。いじめのリーダー格は大会社の令嬢・高島津絢子。彼女によって泥棒の濡れ衣を着せられたハナは、退学に追い込まれてしまう。やがてソ連軍が空襲を開始し、樺太から北海道へ逃れる船に乗り込んだハナ一家だったが、いじめグループによって船から追い出されてしまい……。
description.vi:
Một cô gái với cuộc đời bị lấy đi tất cả mọi thứ do bị bắt nạt, vu oan đã tái sinh thành một người khác và cô quyết định trả thù tất cả những ai đã góp phần đẩy cuộc đời mình vào bước đường cùng!
Ichimura Hana, một cô gái sinh ra và lớn lên ở Karafuto, bị bắt nạt dã man tại một trường nữ sinh vì ngoại hình xấu xí của mình. Cầm đầu nhóm bắt nạt cô là Takashimazu Ayako, thiên kim tiểu thư của công ty sản xuất giấy lớn nhất Karafuto thời bấy giờ. Sau một lần bị vu cáo là kẻ trộm, Hana đã bị đuổi học.
Một thời gian sau, trong một cuộc di tản bởi trận không kích của quân Liên Xô, gia đình Hana đáng ra đã lên được một con tàu để thoát khỏi Karafuto đến Hokkaido, nhưng cả nhà cô đã bị xua đuổi khỏi tàu bởi chính sự vu cáo của bè lũ bắt nạt đó...

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~
I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Master Of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~

description.en:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

altTitles.ja: スプラトゥーン

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.

altTitles.ja: 僕のいけずな婚約者

description.en: Miyuki-san is a young lady born in Kyoto. My relationship with her cannot be described as good. Because… "You’re very good at flattery." Are those words sincere? Or just for show? A frustrating love story where our feelings for each other keep missing the mark.

40 years ago, three mysterious seeds fell to Earth, unleashing countless monsters. Chosen beings arose to fight against these monsters. Those who manifested the powers of this world's heroic spirits into weapons or blessings were called heroes.

Min Jae-ha, who aspired to become a hero, wandered the front lines but couldn't achieve his dream. Giving up hope of becoming a hero, he now works at That’s Real Company.

One day, while investigating a mineral dungeon for work, Min Jae-ha steps on a mysterious summoning circle and unexpectedly gains an extraordinary heroic spirit, one he had always dreamt of contracting with.

However...

"How many times must I tell you? I am alive!"

"Aren't you technically neither dead nor alive?"
"So what can you even do inside my belly?"

Why has this extraordinary heroic spirit taken residence in Min Jae-ha’s belly instead of manifesting as a weapon or blessing?

"Look up to me, and I shall teach you martial arts."

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: The Path Where the Forsythia Fell

altTitles.en: The Path on Which Forsythia Fell

altTitles.ja: レンギョウが散った道〜拾った卵はイケメンだった〜

description.en:
Byeoru, who was living secretly deep inside the mountain, collected an egg under the forsythia shrubs. Soon after, a dragon hatched from the egg.

Byeoru ended up having to take care for the dragon and gave it a name, Shinri.

However, Shinri, who's still a newborn, grows at an amazing rate. Soon after, he grows bigger than Byeoru and Byeoru becomes more concerned about Shinri.

One day, Byeoru is eaten by Shinri...?

"No matter how much I lick and suck you, it's never enough. Every time I smell your sweetness, I want to eat you."

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

I was born with the ability to enter other people's dreams. And I thought that in this life, I would have an easy life as a count when... 

"I don't think Lady Miena will survive this winter." 

Another life with a limited lifespan... To make matters worse, my family is going broke trying to save me. Before I die, I need to pay back our debt and all the money wasted on me! I was just trying to collect useful information and money before passing away when... 

"Who are you?"

"An angel... no you don't look quite right..."

"You entered my dream without a hint of fear."

I fear I have entered a dream I should've have touched.

title.en: Lord Demon King Always Teases Me

altTitles.zh-ro: Mo Wang Da Ren Zong Liao Wo

altTitles.ko: 게임 속 마왕이 자꾸 날 괴롭혀!

altTitles.zh-ro: Mó Wáng Dà Rén Zǒng Liāo Wǒ

description.en: He Mian, a college student who has social anxiety, cleared his favorite game for the 100th time. Gareth, the devil of the game, accidentally transmigrated into the modern world where He Mian was. He Mian is determined to let the devil return to the game as soon as possible. In order to get rid of Gareth's pranks and entanglement, the two must collect magical artifacts from the game which has been spread across the world when Gareth was traversing.

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.en: I Returned as an FFF-Class Witch Doctor

altTitles.es-la: Regrese como un chaman de clase FFF

description.en:
Ma Jinsung was once a top-ranked player in Arsia Chronicle, but he was brutally killed by his trusted leader. After that, he thought he'd wake up in his room... not 10 years in the past! 

Now, prepared to exact his revenge, he jumps right back into the game. But this time, his job class is voodooist, and he gets bonuses for killing other players. The only downside -  if he dies in the game, he dies in real life.

Can Jinsung get his revenge without causing too much carnage? Don't bet on it...

“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.ja: ロック

description.en:
We begin the story as Rock has left her husband, Astro, and their children and wants a divorce because Astro has cheated on Rock (again). As the five year old twins, Rockette and Astro Junior, find pictures of their parents when they were young, we flash back to the ever so popular romcom scenario of when Rock met Astro... except it's Kyoko Okazaki so it's messy, it's kooky, it's funny and it's all in a way that's unique to Kyoko Okazaki.
Between romantic comedy and hallucinated fairy tail, Kyoko Okazaki blows a wind of hysteria in the fashion world and its nights saturated with music and drugs.

A girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, the 'soulmate' decided to marry a man at the age of 28 because she did not want to live an "abnormal life". Only after leaving her to marry a man, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

title.en: Tensei Shitara Hime Datta node Dansou Joshi Kiwamete Saikyou Mahou Tsukai Mezasuwa

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Hime Datta node Dansou Joshi Kiwamete Saikyou Mahou Tsukai Mezasuwa

altTitles.ja: 転生したら姫だったので男装女子極めて最強魔法使い目指すわ

altTitles.en: I Was Reincarnated as a Princess, so I’m Going to Become the Strongest Wizard in the World!

description.en:
Ikuto, an ordinary high school boy, is reincarnated as Isabella, a sheltered princess in a world of magic?!
Although he is happy to be able to use magic, Ikuto's ambitions are crushed when he discovers that, in this world, women are not allowed to use magic.
Still, Ikuto is not ready to give up, and at the age of 16, he decides to leave the castle and embark on a journey to learn magic...?!
A new sensation about a princess disguised as a man (while inwardly a high school boy) and a handsome wizard with special circumstances!

(Source: Hakusensha, translated via DeepL)

Random short comics of or relating to Genya. Rather than uploading them separately, we've uploaded them all under one title for your convenience. If you like them, please consider showing support for the artist by purchasing the doujinshi or by retweeting/liking the comic. You can find links to the author's Twitter in the comments section or credits page.

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Retorno Como O Membro Mais Jovem

description.en: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
description.id: Do Seohan, yang gagal dalam idol survival show terkenal “Stardust Project”, selalu dibayang-bayangi oleh mimpi masa lalunya. Tak pernah meraih kesuksesan, Seohan hanya bisa bekerja sambilan untuk melewati hari-harinya. Namun, akibat sebuah kejadian yang menimpanya, tiba-tiba ia terbangun dan kembali ke 8 tahun lalu, tepat sebelum “Stardust Project” dimulai! Jiwanya 8 tahun lebih tua dari kontestan lainnya, tapi sekarang ia yang termuda di antara mereka. Apakah kali ini Seohan akan berhasil debut sebagai idol?
description.ko:
"25살…그거 아이돌은 못하는 나이잖아요."
유명 서바이벌 아이돌 오디션 '스타더스트 프로젝트'에서 탈락했던 도서한.
꿈에 미련은 못버리고 현실과 타협한 채 알바를 전전하는데…눈을 떠보니 8년 전으로 돌아왔다.
그것도 '스타더스트 프로젝트'를 시작하기 직전으로!
막내가 된 (영혼만은) 최고 연장자, 이번에는 오디션에 합격해 아이돌 멤버가 될 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Do Seohan, que fracassou no famoso programa de sobrevivência de idols "Stardust Project", é sempre assombrado por seus sonhos do passado. Sem nunca ter alcançado o sucesso, Seohan só consegue trabalhar em empregos de meio período para passar seus dias. No entanto, devido a um incidente que lhe aconteceu, ele acordou de repente e voltou a 8 anos atrás, logo antes do início do "Stardust Project"! Sua alma é 8 anos mais velha que a dos outros participantes, mas agora ele é o mais jovem entre eles. Será que Seohan conseguirá debutar como idol desta vez?

altTitles.ja: ひかるtoヒカル

description.en:
"Hikaru to Hikaru" is a comedy about Hikaru Katsuragi, a boy who is a descendant of the Iga ninja, sneaking into a girls' school.

In the Katsuragi family, if you don't master the secret "Kunoichi no Jutsu," which turns your body into a female body, by the age of 18, you won't be recognized as an adult, and his mother was worried about Hikaru's immature technique.

In order for such a Hikaru to become a full-fledged woman, he is ordered to attend a prestigious school for young ladies, Kazami Girls' School, in the form of a woman.

title.en: Sensual Novelist and High Schooler Yuri

altTitles.ja: 官能小説家と中学生の百合漫画

description.en: In a chaotic Joseon dynasty with vampires, ghosts, and shamans, Park Moon-soo, who calls himself a dark-speaker, destroys a corrupted official. In order to subdue the dark master Park Moon-soo, who is trying to revive the vampire king, the court dispatches Anson, a military officer who has just passed the exam, to find Hong Kil-dong, an outlaw who is good at swordsmanship and martial arts and dispatches him to Taebaek Mountain.
description.ko: 흡혈귀와 요괴, 무당이 창궐한 혼란의 조선, 자신을 암흑어사라 칭하는 박문수가 타락한 관아를 파괴하고 다닌다. 다급해진 조정에서는 흡혈귀 왕의 부활을 노리는 암흑어사 박문수를 토벌하라 명하기 위해 갓 무과에 급제한 무관 안손에게 도술과 무술에 능한 도적 홍킬동을 찾아오라 태백산으로 파견한다. <하이브>의 김규삼 작가가 선사하는 요괴 퇴마 개그 판타지 시대극!

description.en: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

The war between humans and vampires will come to an end with the victory of the vampires, as expected by all. In the yet-to-be-invaded Holy Land of Bahal, after a concerted effort to counterattack mankind, he succeeds in creating a "corpse knight" who never dies and a "power source" that can move him, thus reviving the gladiatorial "Gunther" as a "corpse knight."
description.ko: 인간과 뱀파이어와의 전쟁은 모두의 예상대로 뱀파이어의 승리로 끝을 맞이하게 된다. 아직 침략받지 않은 성지 ‘바할’에서 인류의 반격을 위한 각고의 노력 끝에 죽지 않는 ‘시체 기사’와 그를 움직일 수 있는 ‘동력원’ 제작에 성공하여, 검투사였던 ‘군터’를 ‘시체기사’로 되살리게 된다.

title.en: Giri no Kyoudai Dakedo Koibito no Futari wa Doudou to Tsukiaitai

altTitles.ja: 義理の兄弟だけど恋人のふたりは堂々と付き合いたい

altTitles.en: Stepbrothers Are Dating and Want To Be Open About It

description.en:
Kazuma and Yuuya are stepbrothers who are actually lovers and live under one roof (in their parents' house), secretly doing the things lovers do under their parents' radar.

A particular close call is intercepted by Kazuma's quick-thinking. While Yuuya is determined to keep their relationship under wraps, he also begins to feel anxious and conflicted for how long they can keep it a secret.

On the other hand, Kazuma meets Yuuya's student, Matsubara, from his part-time as a cram school tutor by chance when they're out shopping. Seeing their closeness, Kazuma's instincts tells him that he should keep an eye out for him.
He is also curious how Yuuya is doing at the cram school, with Yuuya having a charm that attracts those younger than him...

A possessive younger brother who loves his brother x A popular, soft-type older brother
The two face the feelings they can't hide for each other...

altTitles.ja: ELDEN RING Become Load

description.en:
Guided by a blessing, the fading adventurer who has reached the land between the two lands sets out on a journey to become the king of Elde - and he is not alone.

This comic book depicts Elden Ring's epic adventures, including fascinating characters encountered along the way, various dungeon explorations, and battles with powerful bosses.

title.en: I Became a Childhood Friend of a Mid-Level Boss

altTitles.en: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Middle Boss

description.en:
Do Kyunwoo is the black sheep of his renowned swordsman family. He cannot even catch a rabbit on his own. On his first day of fifth grade, he meets a tranfer student and recalls his past life.

He had reincarnated into the world of a game he used to play called [Brave Hearts]. He was already frustrated that he had reincarnated as a loser, but on top of that, the transfer student is an intermediate/mid-tier boss who will destroy the world!

“Why are you being so nice to me?”

“Because I want to be friends with you.”

Do Kyunwoo’s plan is to become friends with the transfer student in order to prevent the end of the world!

In order to survive in this new world and to reach an ending he desires. He becomes best friends with the mid level boss.

altTitles.ja: Minamike
みなみけ
南家

description.en:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates
